## Soft. Strong.  
Sustainable.

Premium paper products made from 100% tree-free fibers.

Shop Toilet Paper Shop Paper Towels

### Committed To Reel Change

Single-use paper products are essential for our everyday lives, so we
reimagined what paper could be and set out to make more sustainable paper
goods. We tirelessly tested and designed each toilet paper and paper towel
roll without virgin wood pulp or plastic packaging.

Shop Now

### Sustainability Without Sacrifice

Sometimes green goods get a bad rap, but we believe you shouldn’t have to
sacrifice quality to care for the earth. We engineer each roll to be super
soft, strong, and durable while using only earth-friendly recycled fibers and
bamboo fiber for an experience you (almost) won't believe.

Learn More

##### Plastic-Free  
Packaging

Our bamboo toilet paper and recycled paper towels come in 100% plastic-free
packaging that is recyclable and compostable.

##### FREE of Dyes & Inks

Premium, durable paper goods - without any of the added nasty stuff like bpas,
inks, harmful chemicals, dyes, or fragrances.

##### SUSTAINABLE PAPER

We use FSC-certified recycled paper and bamboo wood pulp to make our paper, so
no more trees are cut down for our recycled and bamboo paper products.

##### Carbon Neutral Freight Shipping

Our freight shipping practices produce a net-zero amount of carbon dioxide
emissions.

### Discover Soft,  
Sustainable Paper

Order Now

### Find Us At

10,000+ 5-Star Reviews

## Reel Change  
Feels Good

Taking care of the earth shouldn't have to be hard. Switching to Reel recycled
and bamboo products is a simple switch from your regular paper towels and
regular toilet paper. See what other Reel Paper users have to say about making
the swap.

See more reviews

#### Great for families!

The convenience that comes from the subscription is amazing, and their options
are great for different size families.

Yatasha

#### Great mission & product!

We love the mission of Reel and appreciate their efficient and helpful
customer service. The product is durable, good texture and eco-friendly.

Chelsea

#### Game changing paper!

This toilet paper is a game changer! Doesn’t pill like regular toilet paper
and is made from sustainable bamboo.

Holly

## Zero trees. Zero plastic. Zero compromises.

Shop Now

## Paper For The Planet

This small change can have a big impact on our planet. See what impact the
Reel community is having by making the switch to tree-free, plastic-free paper
products

Learn More

# 60,615

#

Trees Saved

# 32,071

#

Single-use Plastics  
Eliminated

### Wiping out climate change - together.

It takes a village to make a big difference. That’s why we created Reel with
community in mind. From our smart, streamlined designs to our ultra-convenient
shopping experience, we created Reel to be more than just a paper product.
It’s a lifestyle upgrade you’ll be proud to share with your friends and loved
ones.

Our Story

Follow us @reelpaper

## Reel Recycled Paper Towels

Shop

R

reelpaper  

12/08/21

Introducing our new and improved paper towels made from 100% Recycled Paper.
Since day one our mission has been to provide our customers with premium paper
products for their home, without damaging our forests 🌳 We are taking the next
step in our journey with this launch of our first ever recycled paper product.
The recycled paper towels offer many of the same benefits people love about
our bamboo paper towels - including being tree-free, plastic-free, and BPA-
free. But that’s not all - here’s what is new: 🌲Certified by
@fsc_international 🇺🇸 Made and manufactured in the USA ☁️ Softer and more
absorbent  ♻️ Made from 100% Recycled Paper Click the link in bio or check out
our story to order a box today! We are excited to take this next step and
thank you for your continued support! 💚 We want to hear what you think of the
new paper towels, so be sure share your thoughts and tag us @reelpaper!
